trigger: Single press the switch (for Double Rocker switches)

This trigger fires when the humidity reaches the specified value.

trigger: Wall Switch was turned on/off (for Triple Rocker / Channel switch or module)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified triple rocker switch is turned on/off.
This trigger fires when the humidity drops to the specified value.

trigger: Wall Switch was turned on/off (for Double Rocker / Channel switch or module)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified double rocker switch is turned on/off.

trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified single rocker switch is single clicked/double clicked/long pressed.

trigger: Door and window sensor is open
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the door and window sensor is open.

trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified Relay Controller is turned on/off.

trigger: Door and window sensor is closed

trigger: Hub light / bulb was turned on/off
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the specified light is turned on/off.

This trigger fires when the tvoc drops to the specified value.
This trigger fires when the specified double rocker switch is single clicked/double clicked/long pressed.

trigger: Motion is detected and brightness is below

trigger: Motion is detected and brightness is above
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the motion is detected and brightness is above the specified value.

trigger_description: This trigger fires when single press the specified switch.

trigger: Cube was triggered after one-minute inactivity
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the cube is triggered after one-minute inactivity.
